title: Russian Cheese Pancakes (Syrniki)
ingredients: 5 tablespoons all-purpose flour, plus extra for dusting
method: Step 1: Beat egg and white sugar together in a bowl until smooth. Whisk in quark cheese, flour, vanilla sugar, and salt. Mix well until dough is thick and sticky.
Step 2: Divide dough into 5 to 6 portions. Form into balls and coat with some flour. Flatten slightly to form into discs (syrniki).
Step 3: Heat oil in skillet over medium-low heat. Add the syrniki; fry until browned, 5 minutes per side.
